@template public
{{html:
<style type="text/css">
.bulletStyle { list-style-type: disc;}
</style>

}}

{{div: class=white}}
{{div2: class=container | ng-app | ng-controller=MachinePricingController}}

@col 12

h1. Pricing

{{html:
<br>
<ul class="nav nav-tabs tabOfPrice">
  <li class="active"><a href="#CloudSpace" data-toggle="tab">Cloud Space</a></li>
  <li><a href="#MachineDeck" data-toggle="tab">Machine Deck</a></li>
  <li><a href="#StorageDeck" data-toggle="tab">Storage Deck</a></li>
  <li><a href="#DesktopDeck" data-toggle="tab">Desktop Deck</a></li>
  <li><a href="#ApplicationDeck" data-toggle="tab">Application Deck</a></li>
  
</ul>


<div class="tab-content">
  <div class="minCloud tab-pane fade in active" id="CloudSpace">
      <div class="col-md-12 mB15">
        <div class="row operationWrap">
            <div class="btn-group btn-group-sm priceHM floatR">
            <button type="button" class="btn btn-primary" ng-model="pricingModel" btn-radio="'hr'">Hourly</button>
            <button type="button" class="btn btn-primary" ng-model="pricingModel" btn-radio="'mo'">Monthly</button>
            </div>
        </div>
      </div>


}}
{{div: class=row}}
    {{div2: class=col-md-3}}
    {{div4: class=cnrflash }}
                {{div5: class=cnrflash-inner}}
                    {{span: class=cnrflash-label}}
                        MOST @LF POPULAR
                    {{span}}
                {{div5}}
            {{div4}}
        {{div3: class=panel panel-primary}}
            {{div4: class=panel-heading}}
                {{html: <h3 class="headPrice center">First Cloud Space</h3>}}
            {{div4}}
            {{div4: class=panel-body}}
                {{div5: class=the-price}}
                    {{html:<h1>${[plan.price]}<span class=subscript>0</span></h1>}}
                {{div5}}
                {{html:
                <table class="table">
                    <tr><td>Private Cloud Space</td></tr>
                    <tr><td>+ Port Forwarding</td></tr>
                    <tr><td>+ Private Defense Shield</td></tr>
                    <tr><td>+ Public IPv4</td></tr>
                    
                </table>
                }}
            {{div4}}
            {{div4: class=panel-footer}}
                {{html:<a href="/$$space/SignUp" class="btn btn-success" role="button">Sign Up</a>}}
            {{div4}}
        {{div3}}
    {{div2}}
    {{div2: class=col-md-3}}
        {{div3: class=panel panel-primary}}
            {{div4: class=panel-heading}}
                {{html: <h3 class="headPrice center">Basic Cloud Space</h3>}}
            {{div4}}
            {{div4: class=panel-body}}
                {{div5: class=the-price}}
                    {{html:<h1>${[plan.price]}<span class=subscript>0</span></h1>}}
                {{div5}}
                {{html:
                <table class="table">
                    <tr><td>Private Cloud Space</td></tr>
                    <tr><td>+ Port Forwarding</td></tr>
                    <tr><td>+ Public IPv4</td></tr>
                </table>
                }}
            {{div4}}
            {{div4: class=panel-footer}}
                {{html:<a href="/$$space/SignUp" class="btn btn-success" role="button">Sign Up</a>}}
            {{div4}}
        {{div3}}
    {{div2}}
    {{div2: class=col-md-3}}
        {{div3: class=panel panel-primary}}
            {{div4: class=panel-heading}}
                {{html: <h3 class="headPrice center">Advanced Cloud Space</h3>}}
            {{div4}}
            {{div4: class=panel-body}}
                {{div5: class=the-price}}
                    {{html:<h1>${[plan.price]}<span class=subscript>10</span></h1>}}
                {{div5}}
                {{html:
                <table class="table">
                    <tr><td>Private Cloud Space</td></tr>
                    <tr><td>+ Port Forwarding</td></tr>
                    <tr><td>+ Private Defense Shield</td></tr>
                    <tr><td>+ Public IPv4</td></tr>
                    
                </table>

            {{div4: class=panel-footer}}

        {{div3}}
    {{div2}}
    {{div2: class=col-md-3}}

                {{html: <h3 class="headPrice center">Extra Public IPv4</h3>}}
            {{div4}}
            {{div4: class=panel-body}}
                {{div5: class=the-price}}
                    {{html:<h1>${[plan.price]}<span class=subscript>2.50</span></h1>}}
                {{div5}}

                <table class="table">
                    <tr><td>Extra Public IPv4 address for use in one of the Decks</td></tr>

            {{div4}}
            {{div4: class=panel-footer}}
                {{html:<a href="/$$space/SignUp" class="btn btn-success" role="button">Sign Up</a>}}

{{div}}

{{html:

  </div>

  <div class="tab-pane fade in" id="MachineDeck">
  <p>Mothership<sup>1</sup> delivers plans that include a lot more than other clouds and with more flexibility to the choice of your storage!:</p>
    <ul class="bulletStyle">
        <li>Advanced Cloud Space providing a pool of secured private resources</li>
        <li>Private defense shield providing an extremely configurale firewall and router</li>
        <li>Instant snapshots and immediately snapshot rollback</li>
        <li>Deployment of new virtual machines in seconds</li>
        <li>Disaster Recovery Backup (managed by Mothership<sup>1</sup>)</li>
        <li>Secured integration possible with your local office IT through a secured tunnel: no public exposure of virtual machines on the internet!</li>
    </ul>
    <br />
  <div class="col-md-12 mB15">
        <div class="row operationWrap">
            <label class="col-sm-2 control-label">Operation System: </label>
            <div class="col-md-3">
                <select name="country" class="form-control" ng-model="os">
                    <option value="linux">Linux</option>
                    <option value="windows">Windows</option>
                </select>
            </div>
            <div class="btn-group btn-group-sm priceHM floatR">
            <button type="button" class="btn btn-primary" ng-model="pricingModel" btn-radio="'hr'">Hourly</button>
            <button type="button" class="btn btn-primary" ng-model="pricingModel" btn-radio="'mo'">Monthly</button>
            </div>
        </div>
      </div>
  
}}
{{div: class=row}}
    {{div2: class=col-xs-12 col-md-2 | ng-repeat=plan in plans}}
        {{div3: class=panel panel-primary}}
            {{div4: class=cnrflash | ng-show=plan.recommended}}
                {{div5: class=cnrflash-inner}}
                    {{span: class=cnrflash-label}}
                        MOST @LF POPULAR
                    {{span}}
                {{div5}}
            {{div4}}
            {{div4: class=panel-heading}}
                {{html: <h3 class="headPrice"> {[plan.name]} </h3>}}
            {{div4}}
            {{div4: class=panel-body}}
                {{div5: class=the-price}}
                    {{html:<h1>${[plan[os][pricingModel]]}<span class=subscript>/{[pricingModel]}</span></h1>}}
                {{div5}}
                {{html:
                <table class="table">
                    <tr><td>{[plan.mem]} Memory</td></tr>
                    <tr><td>{[plan.cores]} 
                        <ng-pluralize count="plan.cores" when="{'one': 'Core', 'other': 'Cores'}">
                    </td></tr>
                    <tr><td>{[plan.primary]}GB SSD Storage<br>Scale to 100GB</td></tr>
                    <tr><td>Snapshots</td></tr>
                    <tr><td>Backup</td></tr>
                    <tr><td>Firewall & VPN</td></tr>
                    <tr><td>Unlimited Transfer*</td></tr>
                </table>
                }}
            {{div4}}
            {{div4: class=panel-footer}}
                {{html:<a href="/$$space/SignUp" class="btn btn-success" role="button">Sign Up</a>}}
            {{div4}}
        {{div3}}
    {{div2}}



{{div}}

{{html:

<br />
<div class="table-responsive">
    <table class="table table-hover pricingTable">
      
      <thead>
        <tr>
          <th width="40%">Options available on plans:</th>
          <th width="20%">Month</th>
          <th>Hour</th>
          <th></th>
        </tr>
      </thead>
      <tbody>
        <tr>
          <td>
            Extra SSD Storage (up to 100GB)
          </td>
          <td>$0.30</td>
          <td>$0.00042</td>
          <td>Per GB</td>
        </tr>
       <tr>
          <td>
            Extra HDD Storage attached to VM (up to 2TB)
          </td>
          <td>$0.15</td>
          <td>$0.00021</td>
          <td>Per GB</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td>
            Snapshots
          </td>
          <td>$0.15</td>
          <td>$0.00021</td>
          <td>Based on drive size per GB</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td>
            Templates
          </td>
          <td>$0.30</td>
          <td>$0.00042</td>
          <td>Based on drive size per GB</td>
        </tr>
        
      </tbody>
    </table>
  </div>




<p>(*) Unlimited Transfer is subject to fair use policy as descibed in the FAQ section</p>



  </div>

            </div>
        </div>
   </div>
